content: with so many lives being unnecessarily lost with so many black and brown people being murdered with so many babies in cages sometimes you ve just got to angry-knit so if this tickles your angry bone i hope you will join me in declaring fuck trump with every angry stitch normally i say happy knitting but today i say fuck you trump i am not asking for money for this pattern but i am asking that you vote if you are eligible that you turn others out to vote that you march that you give money and/or time to your favorite justice organization together we can overcome hate
